content: The app version (7/22/22) is slower than any before it! Why would you move a drop down menu from the top that had been there for years and put it on the bottom and it's not a coherent menu, it's horizontal choices you have to scroll along with big pictures? Any menu items on an older phone take almost a whole minute to come up! TO CONVOLUTED!

Freezes constantly when utilizing the Wish Lists feature. It's been like this for years at this point; same on every phone I've ever had it on. Trying to change priority of list items/move them to diff lists is a huge pain in the butt, to the point where I usually don't even bother w/ it unless it's really important. Even when it doesn't freeze, it always lags ridiculously when opening the drop-down menus and selecting on that. Then it has bouts of lagging/freezing while just browsing the lists.

Loved this app until everything just disappeared from it with no warning. My Wish Lists, Recent Orders, Search History, everything. Gone. I'm mostly upset about my gift card balance disappearing. I read on Google that this can happen if you accidentally have 2 accounts with the same email and different passwords but I haven't logged in or out of my Amazon account ever since I got the app. It's been logged in the whole time so I definitely do not have 2 accounts. I'm lost. How do I fix this???

The issues started shortly after downloading the app today. Shortly after signing in and briefly using the app, I was on a call and a clock alarm went off, but the alarm couldn't be turned off. Restarted and several of the folders, widgets, and shortcuts on my home screens were gone. Yes, gone! I had them there for a reason! Restarted again. Still gone. And again. Still gone! What's the use of an app if it messes with your phone that way? "Disappointed" is an understatement. Uninstalled.

Used to be great, but now mostly unreliable now. Mid point of my overall opinion. The search doesn't clear or is delayed. My orders, lists etc anything on my personal account are not showing up and I keep getting an error message. EVEN with the update. Even with clearing data on my phone. On the plus side, I can order as much stuff as I want and get same, next, or 2 day shipping. And free returns (up to 90 days mostly) if it's not right bc I can't reorder or make sure I haven't over-ordered.

I've been using Amazon for years. However recently their customer service has really tanked. They are rude, ignorant and over all make it very difficult to return things and get your money back. This is very depressing cause it's impossible to tell if something will fit, since all size 2, 5 ,10 are NOT the same. So if you can't try it on and return it without dealing with rude individuals what's the point of ordering stuff from them when they claim how easy it is to return things.

Surprisingly annoying to use. Struggled to find my list after liking several items. I ordered an item. An hour later, I realised I used the wrong shipping address. Even though the order hadn't been shipped, I was unable to edit the address. The customer service prompts just sent me back to the same uneditable page. I canceled the order. I couldn't simply reorder the item and couldn't find the same one again. Ended up buying the same thing at a higher price.

The app is great, despite a few glitches. The accounts system makes it hard to follow purchases and returns. The Amazon service is still very good but no longer outstanding. Without being a Prime member delivery is poor yet the increase to ¬£8.99/month for this is a bit much when I add up the huge amount I spend with them. I will use them because of their remarkable choice but I will start looking elsewhere, not least to keep other businesses in business.

For a long time, I used my web browser for Amazon because I thought there was no app for Amazon Smile. I was pleasantly surprised to learn you can turn it on as a feature in the app. Now it's my go to for using Amazon. I'd like to give it a higher score, there's a few flaws. Sometimes the product comparison page just disappears, like a glitch. And the app doesn't seem to have a secure sign-in. Password, biometric, something instead of just opening my account with a tap. ‚úåÔ∏è&‚ù§Ô∏è

The app has difficulty loading just about everything. I have a Galaxy S22, at home, new router and modem. My wireless devices all work fine. Other apps load in fine. It's the Amazon app. It's purely and only the Amazon app. Even after clearing caches it still takes forever to load anything. It even has trouble playing downloaded songs. This is a daily problem, too. Amazon is one of the biggest and wealthiest companies and it can't even get its own music app to work. Disgraceful.

This app is great. It was great. I say was because for the last month it has been spazzing out. Every once in a while, turning pitch black pr stark white, sometimes multi colored lines streak the pages, and a product im trying to look at dissapears and reappears like im playing freaking peek a boo with it. I have to close it quite a few times while usig the app to get it to work properly, and its really annoying because it takes forever getting back to what i was looking at.

what a search engine coming from one of the biggest tech companies on the planet. if you use filter by price it will flood you with irrelevant results so you go back to the default "featured" = only what Amazon wants to show you. same searches between app and computer browser yield different results, restricts browsing diverse selection.

Crashes a lot and I'm starting to lose patience for it. I've been using Amazon for a long time but in recent years it just keeps crashing whenever I try to do something other than purchase or browse. I keep trying to edit my wish lists but I can only move/delete/edit 1 or 2 items before it crashes and I have reopen the app and go all the way back into my lisits to the item I was editing. I've put up with it for a few years now but I'm really starting to lose my patience. Please fix this.

I've had this app for years and have always been super happy. Totally user friendly. However, lately it keeps changing to Spanish. This has happened with my while family and friends. I contacted support via email but they never got back to me. I have Uninstalled and reinstalled the app several times but it won't stay in English.

Probably one of the worst ways to shop on Amazon. Not sure how the other OS handle this app, but overall it's terrible to use on Android. It constantly crashes, images and pages frequently don't load, and the customer service pages boots you in circles if prompts are inputted in a certain order. It's terrible overall as a user to have to constantly close and reopen the app. If this is a multi-billion $ company, I would expect a whole lot more out of a UI and basic load speeds.

This has become a glitch ridden nightmare. The UI is all over the place and cluttered. When trying to remove items from wish-list will crash the app. Better off just using your browser.update. it's now lagging and stalling. Its impossible to swipe through items as it freezes. A bloated, unintuitive app, main menu button just above the back buttonüôÑ. Now I can't view my orders.

The app is, more often than not, glitchy. I just had to reinstall it to try and get it to allow me to pick up an Amazon locker package because it would not get off the permissions screen, when I gave it Bluetooth permission about 100 times already. When I had a fraud issue with my account, it was close to impossible to find the right customer service number in the app, but it was easy to find on the actual website. The app sucks, and it sucks more that Amazon requires you to use it for lockers!

The sole purpose of the app was to make it easier to shop from my phone but since you can no longer use it to buy digital content, I have little use for it. Also, I used to be able to access my list of saved items from the home page. Not anymore! It takes a few more clicks and long loading times, which is frustrating. I will be shopping less from the site if it's so complicated and I have to use my computer every time. Disappointing.

Used to love this app.... But over the last few months it has gone down hill. The pages freeze on you as you brown through it and when you go to check your past orders it gets stuck in the rainbow loading screen and won't let you view it. Every once in a while it will pull up but 70 % of the time it doesn't. Very buggy. Please fix!

Update!!! After several months of ordering even with third party buys. I haven't had a problem yet , yes I've returned several things that weren't just what I thought would work for me , no never was there a problem with the product, just it wasn't just what I thought I needed, but without fail , full refund without complaint from Amazon. I will continue to use Amazon for most of my needs and wants because I can't get out much, they allow me to buy and check it out and Return if I need to.

In the Deliveries section of the Subscribe & Save, it would be really helpful if it showed the total cost of that delivery and not just the individual prices of the items being sent. That way I know the full amount my card will be charged after it's all shipped. Otherwise, I absolutely LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è the app!! I never experience any slow loading others have mentioned. I literally will spend 8 hours at a time, couple times a week, looking for the perfect items to add to my cart and buy on pay day!!

While the app is refined enough to allow an easy shopping experience, its also a minefield of scammy subscriptions that you will automatically be subscribed to unless you opt out upon every purchase. We all know that amazon doesnt treat its workers very well, especially in other countries, and this is why i try to leave amazon as a last resort for buying products. Its caught me out a couple of times over the last 2 years and ive missed the automatic subscription that has left me out of pocket.

I've had Prime for years but I've had so many issues in the past year. There's something wrong with their ordering system. My orders get canceled all the time and they always say it was done on my end but I never cancel orders. I ordered a robot vacuum on Prime Day, they canceled my order, and then wouldn't honor the price it was on Prime Day when I tried to reorder it because it was sold by a 3rd party. Disgraceful! The problem is with their system. A billion dollar company can't get it right?

If Amazon did groceries in arkansas and had a point system for fuel like Kroger does, I would buy from them exclusively. I absolutely love the subscribe and save system. I started doing it when my son was a baby and I have saved so much money. It's so easy. I get pretty much everything from them besides fresh groceries. If I don't need some of the items on my list, I just skip them for the month. I never run out of any of the essentials.

Unable to shop. Keeps freezing up and stopping only a few minutes in to searching for an item. ***Update*** Figured out the problem. The app has limited storage. When storage reaches that limit it slows down or stops. Clearing the cache isn't enough. You have to clear storage if app starts slowing down and/or after each time you use it. Amazon needs to reduce file sizes to decrease needed storage and also offer automatic storage clearing at close of app option.

I have been a prime member for years. I use to love Amazon. Recently though they have failed miserably. I pay a slightly higher price because it is " Prime" and I make it up on the delivery. Over the past 6 months I have had numerous orders with delayed delivery and they usually cancel the order just for me to reorder the same product with the same vendor to have it delivered on time. I am not sure what changed with Amazon, but please go back to the old way.

AS A PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT for anyone who uses subscribe and save, make sure every month when they send you the email that you have till a certain date to cancel you go check the prices and screenshot them. I have recently discovered that Amazon is not charging the correct prices it advertises but rather higher prices. I sent almost every thing in my last order back because of this last month. I did in fact take pics this time. I kept thinking that I was being overcharged, now I know.

Normally, the app is great no issues, user friendly for the most part. HOWEVER, lately it keeps switching itself to Spanish! Do u know how hard it is to find the setting to switch languages when you can't read the language? This has happened 3x. Idk if my phone is possessed or the app or others have this issue but it's extremely frustrating! Please, please fix this if it's on your end.

The main reasons for the 2-star rating is the following: With such a massive range of products to offer, at least ensure that your FILTERING and SORTING options work flawlessly. They are pointless. For example, search for an item, 10000 results found, try to sort it by price from low to high, then only 200 items remain! Where did the other 9800 items go? Same happens when you sort by ratings, relevance, etc. different results. Also, so many rubbish and repetitive products listed. Reviews fake!

Personally,based on my experience with this people,I will never order an item through them. None of my items,already payed, arrived to me. No way to speak to somebody of them that can sort out the problem,and the only answer u get is pointing fingers between the Amazon and the seller. If you order something to Amazon,and you pay,u also expect them to do their job properly,not just see them so organized to grab the money,and then what happen after is none of their concerns. Thank you anyway

I don't get notifications to the app anymore about shortly arriving or delivered deliveries. Drivers very rarely ring a doorbell or knock the door. There is an out-of-view place on our doorway, just most drivers don't think and they place packages in front of the door, clearly visible from the street. I haven't given unfavorable review about delivery, yet. Main reason is that Amazon's options for choices. I may have to use "unprofessional delivery" option. How much trouble there is to knock?

Receiving emails and alerts in Spanish. Started on 7/16. Have notified Amazon every day and get the same instructions on how to fix it. It continues to send correspondence in Spanish. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app twice now. That's not fixing it Neither is verifying my language preferences or clearing my app cache file. Each time I contact Amazon I am reassured the problem is fixed....

I like the app in general. But once a week it switches the interface language from English to Spanish. And it takes me quite some time to switch it back, because I don't know Spanish at all. It ales lady happened about 20-30 times and it becomes very annoying. Please fix it. Good app otherwise. Thanks.

I have no complaints yet. It can sometimes be hard to navigate especially from one service, lists, settings, options, and other things Amazon provides. It's kinda like trying to navigate the insides and outs of Google. And I think it's an inherited issue to any service that gets this big. One downside I've had. And this is not Amazon's fault. Eventually like ebay you never know what your gonna get. Or even if it was a deal or not. But I use it more than any other service similar to it.

I have used Amazon for maybe going on 2 years was just a once n a blue moon kinda thing before the past 8 to 12 months and I have got into RC Car Hobby heavily. I never noticed many issues I had to refresh several times more then I thought should have been doing, especially with the Shopping Lists, after reading the reviews I see the issue is not my phone and is the App j figured due to where I live as even wifi speed can vary but my phone works great but the app lags far amount and is annoying.

Wish lists are so annoying now. Before you were able to add a "favorite" item by pressing the heart then selecting the list it should go to. Now, it only let's you save to your default list. So, then you have to go into your default list and "move the item" to a different list one by one. It's so aggravating. Extra work for people who want to start a wish list for baby showers, weddings, or housewarmings.

Over the past few months my order page won't load and the keyboard won't stay on the screen when this happens so I can't search. Also, the app could use a GUI update. It's not hard to use, but something about it feels outdated. I miss Prime Now and being able to order from Fresh Tyme. Please develop a separate app for 2 hour grocery delivery.

The Amazon shopping app for the most part has a smooth, sublime operational niche that most other shopping Apps don't have! It is certainly in the top of the list of all good shopping Apps. However it is not the best or best of the best but well on its way to one of those levels. I've experienced some frustrations with but for the most part my use of the app has been pleasurable,pleasing,pleasant and supreme. I despite it's faults I'd recommend it to the top 1% of the wealthy. Thumbs up! Way up.

Updated 7.6.22: uninstalled/reinstalled app. Still no change. Not sure if my app updated bc it does it automatically but I'm assuming so b/c it suddenly gives no push notifications despite them being on/no settings changes. I order Amazon a lot & always received notifications until June 2nd. The package was not on Prime & I thought maybe that was why, although still strange. Another package showed up & sat 4 hours before I found it yesterday. No notifications. What has happened?? Please fix!

Recently they keep advertising fast shipping on items but then default to the slowest possible shipping, even though faster shipping is free and included w Prime. It means I have to triple check shipping options before buying, which is super irritating, and results in me needing to cancel orders the times I forget to check... often after days are lost waiting. Give me the fast shipping you advertise or don't provide the benefit!!

Since Google and,Amazon stopped selling via the App I have had nothing but problems purchasing kindle items. I have written an email to the email address amazon provides - and because this is amazon, the link sends an automated reply that this is not a valid email address! I have been through the help process three times and every time I end up at the same non functioning email. It is incredible how such a huge business can be so impossible to get help. Not happy at all. Thanks Google and Amazon

Best shopping app there is.. and it's not even close. Amazon took the place of malls and many small businesses (really miss malls, but that's another conversation). The app could use some changes as far as functionality, but otherwise is great. The deals you find on amazon are unheard of. Not sure we'll ever see anything take its place.

Calling the toll free number is a nightmare. No one is trained to help you and all they do is escalate it. You don't hear back for 24-48 hours and then it's only by email. My problem is that it's hit or miss for receiving Amazon emails. I have mysterious Amazon charges and they've locked my account. I also have missing orders from this past week. I can't get anyone to help.

Incredibly slow to load. Most of the time it just locks up on a blank white screen. Crashes Kindle. Very small font used makes it extremely difficult to read about items. Current version has taken to adding Shortcuts which cannot be removed. They're not my shortcuts but what Amazon thinks I want to look at. Developer needs to add option to remove/change these unrequested shortcuts. Needs a major rethink.

I have never had problems with this app. I love their layout and unlike alot of apps, their updates and revamps are superb. For people who say 30 days to return isn't long enough, really? You've got to be kidding. Its a very generous return policy. Yes, they upped their Prime cost. And they did notify. Guess what? Everything is going up. Got to look at the positives. Great shipping, Prime Days, some music, some movies, some books. Ive been using Amazon 2 decades now. Show me a better deal.

Amazon is offering an appstore that is downloadable through the Amazon site. It essentially does the same thing as Google play,but offers a discount based on the amount of credits purchased. Using it has caused the appstore and main account to get locked for trying to make back to back purchases. For a week Amazon's customer service hasn't been able to get the main account working again. I even tried opening another account under another email address. It is now suspended under review. Worthless

Wow. Ok so item search is clogged with sponsored items that are not what I want, not interested in, and actively make it harder to find what I want to buy. Alexa controls do not hide when Alexa is Inactive. Photo controls do not hide and block my ability to scroll through products. New color is bright and lacks night mode option. Thanks for helping me use Amazon less.

App "pocket bought" a massager $100, then put 4 more in my cart, (no, 1-click buy was not engaged). How did this happen? Not acceptable. AI manipulation, for example I start putting items in my cart weeks ahead, AI starts warning inventory down to 1, changes prices up, hides deals to BF Skinner me. I chose delivery on "Amazon day" to use less packaging, they send 10 items 10 boxes. No more, it's not the Amazon we use to love. Walmart online sounds good at this point. Sad

Lately I've been having a ton of issues with Amazon charging me randomly for stuff I'm not subscribing too, and then having to jump through hoops just to get a refund, and then them constantly delivering my packages to the wrong address when I've put in detail what my front door looks like but they get to my apartment building (only 4 apartments, 2 buildings) and they still just toss it on the first porch they see.

Amazon has changed to worse. Everything are chinesse products or bad chinesse copy of products that you can easily find on Aliexpress but in Amazon they are with double or triple the price. The app has bugs everywhere, the desing is non consistent and sometimes the content looks too cramped. I don't know how a company with so much money doesn't invest on making a decent app

Settings Broken, Machine Learning Bizarrely Bad No matter how many times I set my language and currency preferences, they always revert to what I don't want. It's a minor gripe that becomes frustrating over time. The algorithm is surprisingly bad, constantly recommending women's clothing when I have never shown any interest in that class of products.

Yh good and easy at the moment of purchase but when you are looking FOR SOMEYHING SPECIFIC then you can type any phrase/string of word and it will NOT make the search any better. Even with the filter the results are wrong and NON-specific to what you filtered. Please can you make it so when I search for a Fridge WITHOUT freezer, I actually get those results. It's disgusting that you can't find what you know you want because u guys just want us to see every listing across amazon Quite despicable

Reviews have improved from many being fraudulent and lots for the wrong product. I always start with 1 star reviews and go up. Deliveries are good to bad, with some blame goin to UPS. They now want Returns In the delivery container, hope I remember. Customer service is good. The absolute worst part of shopping here is Amazon promotes products when you search for a product. They throw in unrelated products to get your interest and purchase. I go to eBay when I have trouble finding some product

I use Amazon for a lot of things including groceries. Two recent grocery deliveries have me angry though. Product was opened and until I got to it a week later didn't know. And the second delivery product packaging was damaged and taped. I had to throw that away as well. Go to try and report and get a refund and the app says sorry can't return it (obviously) and has a button to contact them for a refund but it just loops back to the same return process with noone to contact. How frustrating.

Past few updates have made this app increasingly slow. Trying to scroll down through wish list, it stalls and sticks. Worse still, the wish list UI has updated and makes having a list useless. It only shows the new, Amazon price. 1) it uses to say "32% less than when added" so you know when the price has fallen... not any more. 2) used items and other sellers prices aren't shown... so, I guess they assume you only buy from one seller, amazon! Very bad update- switch back!!!

Now there is popup adds which I hate. Shipping times and prices are going the wrong direction. Membership is almost 200 a year with taxes. I've been doing more purchases on other sites cause prices are better ie.. newegg, walmart and ebay. Search engine doesn't narrow down/filter options well. Customer service is also going wrong direction. üòë

Unfortunately the app has two major faults, 1)it has become bloated with information I'm not interested in which makes it incredibly tedious to use. Lists, recommendations, things I have no interest in being pushed. 2) Amazon won't let me use it for Kindle books and Kindle will not let me buy books off Paperwhite because I'm in the wrong country even after changing settings. Fubared.

Love Amazon hate the app, every time I going to check on my products or whatever that I'm waiting on it doesn't have the app anymore it's uninstalled why is that? But then when you're on the app it's so slow and acts as if there's not enough signal to load the page each time I press the button to go to a different page use your friendly sort of it's simple but it's so slow and it's glitchy that you don't even want to use it but that going online is better.

Easy to use and works... But Amazon's search in general really sucks. They increased the price of Prime, too, as if they weren't getting enough money. I dropped Prime and switched to eBay. eBay has a highly functional search that brings back exactly what you type in.

Over the weekend the app started showing in Spanish on its own. Now, if I read Spanish I could use the app to change the language. I of course can't I called customer support. They said my language preferences were indeed English. The Android app just be having issues. They'd have someone fix it. Today, a few days later, the app was still in Spanish. I found a menu "idioma" that wasn't there before. I changed my language. Now, the billion dollar company didn't actually fix my bug.

Used to be my most favorite app, and ordered a lot. First of all, I cannot remove Amazon day delivery, "save" button it's not working, if I don't pick at least one Amazon day delivery. Delivery time start taking longer,and longer. Last delivery, I have UPS tracking, but delivery hold in purpose,and says it was my request. I am done with Amazon, I wll start ordering,if they fix it, stop delay, and delivery faster, and give me option,to remove Amazon day delivery.

Great, but some really bad bugs. This has happened multiple times, and it ruins the entire app. I'll order something, say it's shipping, and 4 days later it says "revise payment method". I just recently ordered someone a gift and I needed it on a Monday, it said it would ship Monday, so I forgot about it and moved on. That Monday came, and I woke up to a notification saying "order cancelled, revise payment method." FOUR DAYS LATER??

I love Amazon. If you're on food share, you get a discount and I only pay $6.99 a month for Amazon Prime, it used to be $5.99 but with the price increases, going up, they had to charge an extra dollar but I still get about half off due to being on food share. I get access to Amazon Prime Video, free shipping, their customer service is great and for confusion, they gave me a refund for Amazon Prime and the AMC subscription I have, which was exactly $16.50 USD. I highly recommend them.

app has UI glictches, and is slower then the browser app, sometimes. also would be helpful if the items I requested to return would show in a separate tab on Orders view. I go there frequently to see the deadline for returns. Wish there was a link to gift card balance after return is complete so i can verify the refund was issued indeed.

More of a problem with logistics, they tell you a shipping date and drive the package through your city to another state and give it to USPS. Seems to happen for items under $20. Those lower cost items are the most important. Headlights to me are a safety issue and are very important. You get no satisfaction on the phone with them you get to talk to a foreigner and the call has no positive outcome. I'm a prime member time to reevaluate my membership or use eBay for more accurate delivery times.

Obviously the app is fine for the most part but it'd be great if there was one of those three dot setting bars over recommended items or "continue shopping" items that allows you to say you're not interested or have a "do not recommend" option so they won't keep popping up. Thanks if you read the feed back, Amazon

I do not want this app but cannot delete from phone. I deleted all data, removed all permissions and disabled the application completely as well as removed/relocated the widget. 3 minutes later it appeared in the spot it was prior and it was enabled with the permissions allowed again. This is criminal at best. Stop stealing my information - Stop monitoring my activity - Stop doing everything BUT function as a marketplace. But

Whenever I attempt to manage my Prime membership, the app states that I am unable to sign up for Prime on the app. So then I attempt to access the website from my mobile chrome browser, which then automatically sends me to the app, I don't even have the option to do otherwise. Prime seems to be somewhat significant when it comes to Amazon, so why are you unable to manage a membership on its application? It doesn't make sense to me

App works fine and it's easy to buy stuff. However only giving 2 stars because what you get for the cost of prime (plus they just raised rates to steal more money from people during hard times, very Democrat of them) isn't worth the cost. Prices of products are inflated to compensate for the free shipping so you are literally paying shipping twice if you have a prime account. Plus they do nothing to prevent fraudulent purchasing with stolen credit cards.

Amazon is generally good; however, tab "Your Orders" never loads for me. I can see movement in the colored line of search function, but it never stops searching or returns anything. I've then tried clicking on the "Filter" tab but it's not even enabled. *7/10/2022 UPDATE*: Order search issue still isn't resolved!

I've always liked Amazon since I've started using their site, many years ago. First you raise prime, ok, I understood THEN you stop the 2 day shipping, without notice that I saw. The 2 day shipping was the main reason I signed up for prime in the beginning, years ago. Seems like your not upholding your agreement, that you made. I've never had any complaints in all the years I've used. I'm sure you can do better, than breaking the contract you agreed to.

Can't buy eproducts like ebooks, mp3s, or videos from the app. This is probably cause Google wants a cut of epurchases, but their is no way to cut over to a web browser that doesn't have this limitation. I can no longer wishlist mp3 albums, so I cant even save this search for later on home browser. I really need a non Google store APK file without this epurchase limitation.

The Amazon app is becoming unusable. The app is always freezing while scrolling through the home page, or an item's details page. Changing an item's options like "color" or "size" has frequently caused the app to freeze for 10-30 seconds. This is a terrible customer experience.

Hate it how it say if order more than X amount shipping would be free. When you check out it does not auto select the free shipping but pre-selected the 2 day option. You have to select the free option yourself. Also there's way to many bad quality on Amazon due to many people selling their products which is ordered from China website a low quality and cost but charge 5x the amount on Amazon. Products on Amazon use to be verified and reliable but now it's all chance.

Two stars for two reasons. First of all, I don't have a credit/debit card and therefore cannot spend 50 dollars, and therefore cannot leave reviews on things really need to be addressed, such as my $60 never-used headphones showing signs of wear and tear after not even a week, and now barely able to play sound (Bluetooth or not) without shutting down/randomly disconnecting from my phone. Second of all, I'm being rather generous right now and I don't want to regret it.

I loved the app until about a month ago. At that time, and since, all I get are errors saying I cannot log in due to authentication. I've tried reinstalling to no avail. It's really annoying because I used to use it all the time. Any idea what the issue is? I only just added double authentication in hopes of fixing the issue, but no

Amazon needs to fight Chase on credit conditions. I have no bad credit, no missed payments, and I've spent enough with Amazon to BUY a Chase employee for a year. But because I've not personally had a Chase account, not invested with Chase, or been affiliated with a subsidiary, I was denied the Prime card, despite the credit check that should have came back good and now I'm reconsidering my shopping options being denied that 5% back benefit. Customers like me deserve better

I have two accounts. We shop on my husband's account with prime membership, but every time I log into that account it logs me out of my kindle app and I lose all my downloads. I called customer service and they say there's no way to merge the two accounts or fix the logging-out problem. This really should have been better thought- through. :(

I have 3 items in my basket the add up to ¬£23 and all have free delivery if total order is over ¬£20 but before is defaults to the standard delivery when I go to checkout it's asks for more which more than the ¬£24 I have on my balance so it won't let me proceed with the transaction. It's been like this forever and this NEEDS too be fixed!
